item.title: Get Started with Hugo
item.description: [TOC] Create a new site hugo new site <your-site-name> The new directory <your-site-name> has the following layout: blog ├── archetypes ├── config.toml ├── content ├── data ├── layouts ├── static └── themes Choose a theme git submodule add -b master https://github.com/zyro/hyde-x.git themes/hyde-x Configuration baseURL = "https://shawdon.github.io/" languageCode = "en-us" title = "My New Hugo Site" disqusShortname = "your_disqus_shortname" # Optional, enable Disqus integration MetaDataFormat = "toml" theme = "hyde-x" paginate = 10 [author] name = "Shawdon" [permalinks] # Optional.
